definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: That formerly how to pick, time flies straight forward.
sentences.chinese: 翀那段从前怎么去捡，光阴似箭一直向前。

sentences.english: When it has is lost, brave to give up.
sentences.chinese: 翀当拥有已经是失去，就勇敢的放弃。

sentences.english: Remember, at least you have me.
To improve the price is bold and brave.
sentences.chinese: 翀大胆勇敢是取得提高所付出的代价。

sentences.english: I only hope to have around you, you can warm my air.
sentences.chinese: 翀我只希望身边有一个你，可以温暖我的空气。

sentences.english: Sometimes our vision clears only after our eyes are washed away with ears.
sentences.chinese: 翀有时候，惟有一场眼泪，我们才彻底清晰了视线。

sentences.english: He is the greatest love of my life.
sentences.chinese: 翀他是我一生中最心爱的人。

sentences.english: Don't let yourself trapped inside, open the heart joy.
sentences.chinese: 翀莫让自己困在内，打开心扉喜悦来。

sentences.english: Happiness is when the desolated soul meets love.
sentences.chinese: 翀幸福是孤寂的灵魂遭遇爱的邂逅。

sentences.english: Any one thing, as long as willing, always simple.
sentences.chinese: 翀任何一件事情，只要心甘情愿，总是能够变得简单。

definition: one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing earth/female principle/☷/ancient Chinese compass point: 225° (southwest)
to excel/to surpass/to be scattered/variant of 逸[yi4], leisurely
(of the day) long/old variant of 暢|畅[chang4]
